hero.title: Build Your SaaS
hero.description: NextSaaS is a production-ready starter kit with everything you need to launch your SaaS. Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Turborepo.

productionReady.title: Production Ready
productionReady.description: Built with best practices and ready to scale from day one.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Complete auth system with Supabase integration.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Stripe integration for subscriptions and one-time payments.

uiComponents.title: UI Components
uiComponents.description: Beautiful, accessible components built with Radix UI.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Built-in analytics to track your business metrics.

developerExperience.title: Developer Experience
developerExperience.description: TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and more configured.

cta.title: Ready to Build Your SaaS?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers who are building faster with NextSaaS
